评论概述: Very cute top - just don't wash it...
评论详情: The top is really cute. I bought it for someone else, and they didn't like it, so I kept it. I always wash my new clothes before wearing and that led to a mess.... I turned the shirt inside out, thinking I was protecting the lace from snagging on other things. Instead, the shirt stuck to itself - not just one single spot... like half of the shirt was stuck to the other half and I had to rip it apart... Now I have to trim off all the broken threads from the lace that I had to rip apart. I'll probably still wear it, but I would not buy it again - it's a mess. A cute mess, but a mess. If you don't ever wash it, you should be fine ;)

评论概述: Pretty, true to size, well-made, but one design issue
评论详情: I am 5'6" 150lb, 34B, normally a medium. Bought a large. It was a tad loose in the waist area, but stretchy and comfortable. Looks amazing. I'm normally not a frilly, girly, lace person but I loved it enough wearing it for a Victorian costume that I considered rotating it in to my normal wardrobe. However, I had one pretty major issue. After wearing it for a few hours I noticed that the lace started snagging with itself in the armpit area, so much that I would lift my arms and have to rip the threading apart to release the sleeve from the body. I probably looked really weird messing with my underarms throughout the evening. Perhaps if I didn't move my arms much, or walked around with airplane arms, or even held them like the model in the photo (which is probably the best answer) it would be ok. I think its great for photo shoots or wearing for a very short period of time.
this is a nice shirt and attractive, but has less stretch than expected.  Purchased it for a Lizzie Borden costume, but is now in regular rotation

评论概述: NOT for real plus size women
评论详情: I was so excited to find this shirt for our company Victorian themed holiday party.  However, I don't think this company knows anything about dressing real plus size women.  It sort of fit in the sleeves and neck area, but it was extremely tight over the bust, and that's where it ended.  Literally.  It was so short, it left everything from mid tummy down bare. I know it's stretchy material, but wasn't that stretchy enough to pull down to cover half of my torso. So back it goes and I won't be shopping this brand again.

The only downside is the loop to button the one button at the back of the neck is a bit tricky, but I managed.  May have a better loop made eventually.
